entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
